message_1: Suppose you want to encrypt the message "10101010" using the one-time pad encryption technique. If your secret key is "11001100", what is the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt a message using the one-time pad encryption technique, we perform an XOR operation between the message and the secret key. In this case, the message is "10101010" and the secret key is "11001100".
